column5: well... if you hang them on the tree... they could be "family " oriented with a personal;a touch from you
Just doin' my part to bring us out of the recession!!!!
ada boy....  we need MORE guys like you in this world
Thats my kind of christmas shopping!
I hear the little Foxee's are great lures You should be good for a while with all these
I've done well with the mid sized ones and the larger Badd Boyz jigs. I didn't even know that the lil foxee's came in a giant size, they should work great for our big lakers.
The mid size is what we use for whities down here.... Tell me Dave, have you done any ice fishing lately??

I haven't been able to get out yet this winter (too much OT at work   ) Right now I'm at the parents house in Belwood   when I should be home making swiss cheese of all the lakes. The forcast for the 2 weeks I'm here is beautiful back in Yellowknife, then it turns to crap as soon as I get home!!! Two weeks ago we had highs of -49C and just as it warms up into the high teens to -25 I have to hop on a plane and leave.  The one bright spot will be the few days of winter steelheading I get to do.   That and filling up on stuff I can't get back home like the odd lure or two.
